regen.new_specification: The system shall display an error message and retain entered data if the save operation fails due to network issues.

regen.absent_element: situation of timeout or session expiration
regen.new_specification: The system shall auto-save draft data and notify the user if the session expires during data entry.
The system shall generate a warning message when the user attempts to close the interface without saving data.

label: The system shall direct the user to the xxx Page if the user chooses to click the close button without entering any data.
absence: situation of clicking the close button
